Title: Relates to actions commenced by immediate family members within the zone of danger for intentional or negligent infliction of emotional distress
Summary: Permits immediate family members within the zone of danger to recover damages for intentional or negligent infliction of emotional distress; includes grandparents.
LawCode: Add ยง11-108, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to recovery by immediate family members for intentional or negligent infliction of emotional distress
